artefact.title: Truth Can’t Be Moderated — It Must Be Verified
artefact.author: Gino Papa

verification_scope.description: Full-text verification of the authored PDF white paper titled 'Truth Can’t Be Moderated — It Must Be Verified'.
claims_assessed: Document integrity from local hash to anchored Merkle root
Conceptual alignment with Luxara protocol design and public signals
boundaries: No fact-checking of all external references or citations
No legal review of regulatory interpretations

human_attestors.attestation: Author and publisher of the white paper; content reviewed and approved for anchor.

consensus.divergence_handling: No material divergence detected between human intent and AI analysis at the time of VID issuance.

provenance_notes: Single-source artefact created and exported by the author.
No intermediate edits between hash computation and on-chain anchoring.

anchor.verification_method: Direct lookup on public Signet explorer using TXID and recomputation of SHA-256 over the published PDF.
anchor.notes: Anchor performed from Luxara Signet wallet 'luxara' using manual raw transaction with OP_RETURN.
